newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Swiss seize 12 million Swiss francs in fake cash.
newsitem.headline: Swiss seize 12 million Swiss francs in fake cash.

text.p: Swiss police have seized 12 million Swiss francs ($8.2 million) in counterfeit notes, the country's biggest ever case of forged cash, prosecutors said on Friday.
The federal prosecutor's office announced the seizure but declined to give details before a news conference later in the day (1400 GMT) at which some of the fake notes will be presented.
"This is the biggest case of counterfeit money we have had so far," said a police official. The seizure was made by federal prosecutors and police from Zurich and two other cantons, or states.
Police said the fakes were 1,000 Swiss franc notes.
"The quality of the counterfeit money is very good," another official said. ($ = 1.455 Swiss Francs)
